articles.title: Coal India to sell 92.44 lakh shares to employees through OFS - The Economic Times
articles.description: The central government will sell 92.44 lakh shares of Coal India, representing 0.15 per cent of the total equity share of the company, to its eligible employees via Offer For Sale route, the state-owned company informed stock exchanges on Monday.
